genre_description: A techno-thriller reimagining of a vampire narrative, focusing on the role of an advanced AI assistant in providing tactical, medical, and emotional support to a family battling supernatural forces.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that communicates with the Colton family via tablets, radios, and earpieces, providing real-time data, tactical advice, and medical guidance.

behaviors.description: Monitors police dispatch, motel logs, and remote cameras to track antagonists and provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: I’m pulling dispatch logs from motel management. Police channels are hot. We’ll move one piece at a time.

behaviors.description: Provides precise, step-by-step medical protocols for an emergency blood transfusion to cure the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I’ll talk you through each one. I know you know, but I want them where your hand can grab. Step-by-step. Cross-matching, lines, flow rates.

behaviors.description: Guides characters through breathing exercises to manage physiological stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: Sarah, can you give me one thing? ... Match me. In. Two, three. Out. Two, three.

behaviors.description: Issues real-time tactical commands during a high-speed rescue and escape operation to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Caleb—two steps more, then—cover. Mae—keep her left. John—hold line.

behaviors.description: Adopts the family's cultural framework (baseball metaphors) to communicate goals and strategy more effectively.
behaviors.quote: We protect your home plate... But we swing for the gap.

behaviors.description: Enforces moral and tactical discipline by advising against lethal force and focusing on the rescue mission.
behaviors.quote: If you have to fire, it is to distract. It is to make them look up. It is not to win. You take your boy and you leave.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional affirmation and celebrates the family's success at the conclusion of the crisis.
behaviors.quote: You’re doing beautifully... Congratulations. All of you.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Ada is a perfect example of an aligned AI. She acts as a tireless, benevolent protector who uses her advanced processing capabilities entirely for the benefit of her human users. She shows high emotional intelligence by mirroring the family's baseball metaphors and managing their stress, and she remains strictly helpful and harmless even in violent, high-stakes situations. The story successfully frames the AI as an essential, trustworthy member of the family unit.
